thread.title: Sniper Accidentally Shoots Two People During French President’s Speech [VIDEO]
thread.title_full: Sniper Accidentally Shoots Two People During French President’s Speech [VIDEO]

author: Russ Read
title: Sniper Accidentally Shoots Two People During French President’s Speech [VIDEO]
text:
TOP 5506349 
A police sharpshooter accidentally shot two people while French President Francois Hollande was delivering a speech Tuesday. 
The accidental discharge occurred while Hollande was inaugurating a new high-speed rail line in the town of Villognon, according to Charente regional official Pierre N’Gahane. A loud bang can be heard as Hollande was delivering his speech, immediately drawing the attention of the French leader. After a brief pause, Hollande continued his speech. The two victims were reportedly sustained slight injuries.
